subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|水|c1=s|t1=water|𦘔|c2=p|ls=psc}}. {{och-l|𦘔}} has been simplified into the unrelated {{och-l|聿}} in the clerical script.
